Title: Oathbringer
Author: Brandon Sanderson
Description: The eagerly awaited sequel to the #1 New York Times bestselling Words of Radiance, from epic fantasy author Brandon Sanderson at the top of his game.

Title: A Wild Sheep Chase
Author: Haruki Murakami
Description: His life was like a recurring nightmare: a train to nowhere. But an ordinary life has a way of taking an extraordinary turn.

Title: The Final Empire
Author: Brandon Sanderson
Description: In a world where ash falls from the sky, and mist dominates the night, an evil cloaks the land and stifles all life.

Title: The City and the Stars
Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Description: Men had built cities before, but never such a city as Diaspar. For millennia its protective dome shut out the creeping decay and danger of the world outside. Once, it held powers that rule the stars.
